Source.Name: goldendict
Source.Summary: feature-rich dictionary lookup program, supporting multiple dictionary formats
Source.Description: feature-rich dictionary lookup program, supporting multiple dictionary formats (StarDict/Babylon/Lingvo/Dictd) and online dictionaries, featuring perfect article rendering with the complete markup, illustrations and other content retained and allowing you to type in words without any accents or correct case

Package.Name: goldendict
Package.Summary: feature-rich dictionary lookup program, supporting multiple dictionary formats
Package.Description: feature-rich dictionary lookup program, supporting multiple dictionary formats (StarDict/Babylon/Lingvo/Dictd) and online dictionaries, featuring perfect article rendering with the complete markup, illustrations and other content retained and allowing you to type in words without any accents or correct case
